name: Blazing soul·Soaring flame
description: legendary Bow with power of the magical fire, the fiery power will condense when holding it, release the Bowstring and send the flaming arrow into victim's heart.

name: Blessing Scroll
description: After the mentor uses this scroll, the student can receive magic items with [divine] effects. Because of the scarcity, the item can only be used by the mentor against his students.

name: Blessing·Blue
description: The sun lights up the ground after dawn, Carol is singing to the cloud. Big angels are wearing this headwear, this is blue as ocean

name: Blessing·Dark
description: The sun lights up the ground after dawn, Carol is singing to the cloud. Big angels are wearing this headwear, this is dark as night.

name: Blessing·Flame
description: The sun lights up the ground after dawn, Carol is singing to the cloud. Big angels are wearing this headwear, this is red hot as flame.

name: Blessing·Green
description: The sun lights up the ground after dawn, Carol is singing to the cloud. Big angels are wearing this headwear, this is green as tree

name: Blinker
description: The paper for covering eyes is sometimes used for other purposes.

name: Blinker Blueprint
description: The paper for covering eyes is sometimes used for other purposes.

name: Blood Axe [1]
description: The magic axe will be in a state of bloodthirsty excitement and look for the enemy's axe.
effect: When Luck reaches 90, Atk ＋100,When Refining ＋5, ＋10, ＋15, Damage of [Mammonite] ＋10%, ＋20%, ＋30% respectively; Zeny cost of [Mammonite] ＋20%, 30%, 50%.

name: Blood Axe [2]
description: The magic axe will be in a state of bloodthirsty excitement and look for the enemy's axe.
effect: When Luck reaches 90, Atk ＋100,When Refining ＋5, ＋10, ＋15, Damage of [Mammonite] ＋10%, ＋20%, ＋30% respectively; Zeny cost of [Mammonite] ＋20%, 30%, 50%.

name: Blood Sucker
description: A cursed mask made from a vampire tooth. Maybe you can absorb the vitality of your opponent with it?

name: Blood Sucker Blueprint
description: The cursed man is on the opposite side of God, and is used by many parents for scaring children to go to bed earlier. Such an earl, even sucking blood occasionally, is still elegant for over thousands of years.

name: Blood Tears [1]
description: A Katars with a bloodletting slot. The wounds are wide and difficult to heal, which creates huge injuries.

name: Blood Tears [2]
description: A Katars with a bloodletting slot. The wounds are wide and difficult to heal, which creates huge injuries.

name: Bloody Axe [1]
description: An axe designed by Kingley, the grumpy forging master, it will cause the target keep bleeding.
effect: When Luck reaches 90, Atk ＋100,[Mammonite] has a 10% chance to trigger Crit, which cause skills deal 1.5 times of damage

name: Bloody Axe [2]
description: An axe designed by Kingley, the grumpy forging master, it will cause the target keep bleeding.
effect: When Luck reaches 90, Atk ＋100,[Mammonite] has a 10% chance to trigger Crit, which cause skills deal 1.5 times of damage

name: Bloody Cross [1]
description: Just like the scary bloody red, the cross-shaped mace with the force of Shadow frightens people to hell.
